name: CATH - Protein Structure Classification
description: CATH is a classification of protein structures downloaded from the Protein Data Bank. We group protein domains into superfamilies when there is sufficient evidence they have diverged from a common ancestor.

dataset.name: Collection
dataset.description: CATH Domain Classification List (latest release) - protein structural domains classified into CATH hierarchy.

dataset.name: Collection
dataset.description: CATH Domain Boundaries List (latest release) - PDB residue start/stop boundaries for CATH protein structural domains.

publication.name: CATH: an expanded resource to predict protein function through structure and sequence.
